animes.title: One Piece
animes.author: Eiichiro Oda
animes.genre: Action, Adventure, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy, Shounen
animes.synopsis: Monkey D. Luffy and his crew of pirates set sail on a grand adventure across the Grand Line, searching for the legendary treasure known as One Piece. Along the way, they encounter powerful foes, make new friends, and uncover the secrets of the world.

animes.title: Naruto
animes.author: Masashi Kishimoto
animes.genre: Action, Adventure, Super Power, Martial Arts, Shounen
animes.synopsis: Naruto Uzumaki, a young ninja with a dream of becoming the strongest ninja and earning the title of Hokage, faces numerous challenges and battles in the Hidden Leaf Village. Along the way, he forges strong bonds with his friends and learns valuable life lessons.

animes.title: Attack on Tian
animes.author: Hajime Isayama
animes.genre: Action, Drama, Fantasy, Mystery, Shounen, Super Power
animes.synopsis: In a world where humanity is on the brink of extinction due to giant humanoid creatures called Titans, Eren Yeager joins the Survey Corps to fight back and uncover the truth behind the Titans' existence. The story explores themes of survival, betrayal, and the mysteries of the Titans.

animes.title: Dragon Ball Z
animes.author: Akira Toriyama
animes.genre: Action, Adventure, Comedy, Martial Arts, Fantasy, Super Power, Shounen
animes.synopsis: Goku, a Saiyan warrior, embarks on various adventures and battles against powerful foes to protect Earth and the universe. Along the way, he discovers his heritage, forms lifelong friendships, and becomes one of the mightiest warriors in the cosmos.

animes.title: Death Note
animes.author: Tsugumi Ohba
animes.synopsis: Light Yagami, a high school student, gains the power to kill anyone whose name he writes in a mysterious notebook called the Death Note. As he uses the Death Note to eliminate criminals, he becomes entangled in a cat-and-mouse game with the brilliant detective known as L.

animes.author: Kohei Horikoshi
animes.title: My Hero Academia
animes.genre: Action, Comedy, Super Power, School, Shounen
animes.synopsis: In a world where almost everyone possesses superpowers known as Quirks, Izuku Midoriya is born without one. Determined to become a hero like his idol, All Might, Izuku enrolls in U.A. High School to train and become the world's greatest hero.

animes.title: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
animes.author: Hiromu Arakawa
animes.genre: Action, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Magic, Military, Shounen
animes.synopsis: The story follows brothers Edward and Alphonse Elric, who use alchemy in their quest to find the Philosopher's Stone to restore their bodies after a failed alchemical experiment. Their journey takes them through a world full of political intrigue, dark secrets, and powerful alchemy.

animes.title: Hunter x Hunter
animes.author: Yoshihiro Togashi
animes.genre: Action, Adventure, Fantasy, Shounen, Super Power
animes.synopsis: Gon Freecss embarks on a journey to become a Hunter, a prestigious and elite profession with various opportunities. Along the way, he forms friendships and faces incredible challenges to uncover the mysteries surrounding his absent father and the Hunter Examination.

animes.title: One Punch Man
animes.author: ONE
animes.genre: Action, Sci-Fi, Comedy, Parody, Super Power, Supernatural, Seinen
animes.synopsis: Saitama, a hero who can defeat any opponent with a single punch, finds himself bored and unfulfilled due to his overwhelming strength. Despite his power, he seeks a worthy adversary to challenge him and bring excitement back into his life.

animes.title: Sword Art Online
animes.author: Reki Kawahara
animes.synopsis: In the virtual reality MMORPG game Sword Art Online, players are trapped by the game's creator and must clear all the levels to escape. Kirito, one of the players, sets out on a quest to free everyone and, in the process, forms deep connections with other players.
